name: Flesh Meld

traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The flesh meld can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

traits.name: Aura of Death
entries: At the start of each of the flesh meld's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage and have the {@condition poisoned} condition until the start of the flesh meld's next turn.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The flesh meld has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The flesh meld can climb difficult surfaces, including ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The flesh meld makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5 damage) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 15) and is pulled up to 15 feet toward the flesh meld.

senses: blindsight 60 ft. (can't see beyond this radius)
